alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 7:53PM CDT until May 09 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. James River at Galena affecting Stone County. James River NEAR Boaz affecting Stone and Christian Counties. For the James River Basin...including Boaz, Galena...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, County Road 106-531 south of the gage floods near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 800 PM CDT.
